parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear suspension toe link can cause loss of control while driving, especially when braking, which can lead to accidents and injuries.
symptoms: The vehicle shifts or sways while braking
rear end of the vehicle shifts while depressing the brake pedal
worn or fractured rear suspension toe links.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The transmission fault can cause the vehicle to shut off unexpectedly, leading to a loss of control and increasing the risk of accidents. Additionally, the vehicle may roll away if not properly put in park, potentially causing damage or injury.
symptoms: The vehicle shuts off at a stop sign or traffic light
the transmission is not in park
the vehicle jerks or hesitates while reversing
the vehicle rolls away if not properly put in park.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure to engage park can cause the vehicle to roll away, potentially causing damage or injury.
symptoms: The vehicle rolls away if not properly put in park
the transmission is not in park.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: APIM (Audio and Premium Instrument Module) Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the APIM can cause the loss of critical vehicle functions, including the rearview camera, heating and air conditioning controls, radio, and car settings, which can increase the risk of accidents and compromise driver comfort and convenience.
symptoms: The media console screen shuts off randomly
the heating and air conditioning controls are non-functional

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden detachment of the B-pillar trim while driving can cause a distraction, leading to accidents, and expose sharp unfinished edges, posing a risk of injury to occupants.
symptoms: The B-pillar trim comes off while driving
